Name: adiaspiromycosis
Definition: A primary systemic mycosis that is a fungal infection located_in lungs

Name: invasive aspergillosis
Definition: An aspergillosis that is a serious fungal infection of the lung with pneumonia caused by Aspergillus

Name: obsolete tonsillar aspergillosis
Definition: An aspergillosis that involves fungal infection of the tonsils by Aspergillus species.

Name: obsolete pulmonary blastomycosis
Definition: A primary systemic mycosis that results_in fungal infection located_in lungs

Name: obsolete cervix tuberculosis
Definition: A primary systemic mycosis that results_in fungal infection located_in lungs

Name: obsolete niacin deficiency
Definition: A primary systemic mycosis that results_in fungal infection located_in lungs

Name: obsolete iodine deficiency
Definition: A primary systemic mycosis that results_in fungal infection located_in lungs

Name: obsolete hepatic Torque teno virus infectious disease
Definition: A viral infectious disease that results_in infection located_in liver

Name: pulmonary aspergilloma
Definition: An aspergillosis that presents as a clump of tangled mass of Aspergillus fungus fibres

Name: obsolete mycoplasmal pneumonia
Definition: A bacterial pneumonia caused by the genus Mycoplasma.

Name: lung abscess
Definition: A lung disease characterized by microbial infection which causes a type of liquefactive necrosis of the pulmonary tissue and formation of cavities containing necrotic debris or fluid.

Name: pneumonic plague
Definition: A plague that results_in infection located_in lung

Name: dirofilariasis
Definition: A filariasis that is a zoonotic infection caused by nematodes Dirofilaria immitis or Dirofilaria repens

Name: meconium aspiration syndrome
Definition: A syndrome that results_in rheumatoid arthritis

Name: obsolete esophageal metastasis
Definition: A syndrome that results_in rheumatoid arthritis

Name: respiratory failure
Definition: A lung disease characterized by inadequate gas exchange by the respiratory system.

Name: obsolete apnea of prematurity
Definition: A lung disease characterized by inadequate gas exchange by the respiratory system.

Name: pneumocystosis
Definition: An opportunistic mycosis that is located in lungs

Name: pulmonary alveolar microlithiasis
Definition: A commensal streptococcal infectious disease that involves infection of the pharynx and sometimes the larynx and tonsils. It is caused by Group A Streptococcus bacteria. The common symptoms include fever

Name: pulmonary hemosiderosis
Definition: A lung disease with an unknown etiology affecting the lungs which results in bleeding from tiny alveolar capillaries. Examination of sputum and bronchoalveolar lavage fluid can disclose hemosiderin-laden alveolar macrophages (siderophages)

Name: pulmonary alveolar proteinosis
Definition: A lung disease that is characterized by abnormal accumulation of surfactant occurs within the alveoli

Name: obsolete secondary syphilitic periostitis
Definition: A lung disease that is characterized by abnormal accumulation of surfactant occurs within the alveoli

Name: granulomatosis with polyangiitis
Definition: An autoimmune hypersensitivity disease that is characterized by necrotizing granulomatous inflammation of the upper and lower respiratory tract

Name: obsolete Yersinia enterocolitica intestinal infectious disease
Definition: A Yersinia infectious disease that involves infection of the intestine caused by Yersinia enterocolitica. The symptoms include fever

Name: lung cancer
Definition: A respiratory system cancer that is located_in the lung.

Name: pulmonary sarcoidosis
Definition: A sarcoidosis that is characterized by noncaseating granulomatous infiltration of the lungs and supporting lymph nodes

Name: pulmonary systemic sclerosis
Definition: An autoimmune hypersensitivity disease that involves inflammation or pain in the muscles

Name: acute chest syndrome
Definition: A lung disease that involves a vasoocclusive crisis of the pulmonary vasculature seen in patients with sickle cell anemia. The crisis is initiated by a lung infection
Synonym: acute chest syndrome in sickle cell disease

Name: obsolete rheumatic pneumonia
Definition: A lung disease that involves a vasoocclusive crisis of the pulmonary vasculature seen in patients with sickle cell anemia. The crisis is initiated by a lung infection

Name: pneumonic tularemia
Definition: A tularemia that is located_in lungs. The bacteria are transmitted_by breathing dusts or aerosols containing the organisms. The infection has_symptom cough

Name: obstructive lung disease
Definition: An ischemia that is characterized by insufficient blood flow to the brain to meet metabolic demand.

Name: middle lobe syndrome
Definition: A lung disease that is defined as a recurrent or chronic collapse of the right middle lobe

Name: bronchiolitis
Definition: A lung disease that is an inflammation of the bronchioles

Name: obsolete Poxviridae infectious disease
Definition: A dsDNA virus infectious disease that results_in infection in animals and humans

Name: pulmonary tuberculosis
Definition: A tuberculosis that is a contagious disease located_in lungs. The infection has_symptom fever

Name: obsolete environmental illness
Definition: A tuberculosis that is a contagious disease located_in lungs. The infection has_symptom fever

Name: interstitial lung disease
Definition: A lung disease that is characterized by inflammation and altered lung interstitium compromising pulmonary function and often has_symptom shortness of breath

Name: chronic granulomatous disease
Definition: A phagocyte bactericidal dysfunction characterized by an inability to resist repeated infectious diseases and a tendency to develop chronic inflammation. Life-threatening recurrent fungal and bacterial infections affecting the skin

Name: lymphangioleiomyomatosis
Definition: A cell type benign neoplasm that is composed of lipocytes.

Name: pulmonary plasma cell granuloma
Definition: A embryonal cancer that is located in the kidney.

Name: lung benign neoplasm
Definition: A supratentorial cancer that is located_in the cerebrum.

Name: obsolete Helicobacter pylori infectious disease
Definition: A supratentorial cancer that is located_in the cerebrum.

Name: pulmonary immaturity
Definition: A soft tissue cancer that is a slow growing tumor of an unknown origin that effects children and effects young adults.

Name: obsolete malignant miscellaneous mesenchymal tumor
Definition: A soft tissue cancer that is a slow growing tumor of an unknown origin that effects children and effects young adults.

Name: silo filler's disease
Definition: A hypersensitivity reaction type IV disease that is characterized by chronic urticarial rash and monoclonal IgM gammopathy

Name: obsolete agricultural workers' disease
Definition: A hypersensitivity reaction type IV disease that is characterized by chronic urticarial rash and monoclonal IgM gammopathy

Name: pneumonia
Definition: A lung disease that involves lung parenchyma or alveolar inflammation and abnormal alveolar filling with fluid (consolidation and exudation). It results from a variety of causes including infection with bacteria

Name: pulmonary artery disease
Definition: An artery disease that is located in the lungs.

Name: maple bark strippers' lung
Definition: An opportunistic mycosis that is located_in lungs caused by inhalation of fungal spores while stripping the bark from maple logs

Name: Goodpasture syndrome
Definition: An autoimmune hypersensitivity disease that is characterized by antibody attack of the basement membrane in lungs and kidneys
